description: Retention of of rear outbuilding, front porch, front garden boundary wall with railings and gate. Erection of a rear dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The applicant has not robustly demonstrated (missing plans) the scale of the proposed outbuilding or rear dormer roof extension and as such officers are unable to make a full assessment as to the impact of the proposed development on neighbouring amenity. In the absence of this information, it is likely that the proposed development would adversely affect the amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties by reason of overbearing appearance, loss of light or loss of privacy. Therefore, the proposed development is contrary to Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.

Tthe applicant has not provided sufficient information to demonstrate that he proposed development would be of a high quality design that respects the character and appearance of the original building and the prevailing character of the surrounding area, the proposal would thereby conflicting with Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
